entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow mixed with rain beginning near noon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
